The land was located in Haining (size not disclosed), and the construction was completed on a date not disclosed. The leasing status was not disclosed over the period. The land (land use rights) and warehouses (buildings) were depreciated using the straight-line method over 50 years and 20 years of useful life, with residual value rates of 0% and 4%, respectively.\n\nAs at this report date, Project Haining Wanpu had not conducted final accounts. Though management stated that most primary contracts had been verified and accounted for, the original costs may still not be finalised. Potential under-estimated construction payables and CAPEX commitments may still exist. You should confirm with management regarding any future CAPEX plans and factor capital commitments (if any) into your valuation model.\n\nTotal properties of Project Haining Wanpu were mortgaged as loan collateral in favour of a bank not disclosed.",
